00055 static int kbhit(void)
00056 {
00057         struct timeval timeout;
00058         fd_set read_handles;
00059         int status;
00060 
00061         raw();
00062         /* check stdin (fd 0) for activity */
00063         FD_ZERO(&read_handles);
00064         FD_SET(0, &read_handles);
00065         timeout.tv_sec = timeout.tv_usec = 0;
00066         status = select(0 + 1, &read_handles, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00067         if(status < 0)
00068         {
00069                 printf("select() failed in kbhit()\n");
00070                 exit(1);
00071         }
00072         return status;
00073 }
